kittens.headline: A fluffy wonder bundle
kittens.teasertextshort: A real wonder bundle, that will have you brimming with joy.
kittens.longteaser: Once you get to know him, we guarantee that this little wonder bundle will have you brimming with joy. Our staff certainly is.

statements.statement: "This cat really is a bundle of joy. I play with him every day â€” and he types such fun things on my computer."

kittens.teasertextshort: Voted Cutest kitten by kittentesters.com 3 years straight. We can see why.
This clever kitty has been specially trained to never sit on keyboards.
